column4: i use dual boot. windows xp and ubuntu. can i use widows xp's net connection in ubuntu?
you can connect both machines, but it'll be a "different" connection;  I think you're confused about what that means, although I'm not sure what you're confused about exactly
it's the "notification area", just right-click on the panel and re-add it
or if it's really just the icon missing, alt-f2 -> "nm-applet"
